Amazon's Presidents Day MacBook Air sale discounts the ultraportable laptops to as low as $749, with Best Buy offering flash deals today only as well.

Amazon is offering shoppers a bonus $50 discount on top of a $200 instant rebate on Apple's standard M2 MacBook Air 13-inch with 16GB of RAM and 256GB of storage, bringing the price down to $749 for Presidents Day.

Buy for $749

Apple's latest M3 Air is also marked down, with prices falling to as low as $899 today only.

13-inch MacBook Air markdowns

  • M2 13" 8C GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $749 ($250 off)
  • M3 13" 8C GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $899 ($200 off) today only at Best Buy
  • M3 13" 10C GPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,099 ($200 off)
  • M3 13" 10C GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,299 ($200 off)

15-inch MacBook Air sale

  • M3 15" 10C GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD: $1,099 ($200 off) at Amazon & Best Buy
  • M3 15" 10C GPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,299 ($200 off) at Amazon
  • M3 15" 10C GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD: $1,499 ($200 off) at Amazon
